segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar like a little thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be in for a surprise when she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, but she’s just focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is actually kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to notice what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
